check-status-code.title: HTTP Code to check for
check-status-code.description: HTTP code to check against. Empty will use Cluster default.

check-http-header-dict.title: HTTP header dict to check
check-http-header-dict.description: JSON dict of expected HTTP header, like {"Cache-Control": "max-age=3600, public", "Vary": "Accept-Encoding"}.Â Empty will use Cluster default.

check-certificate-expiration-days.title: Certificate expiration days check
check-certificate-expiration-days.description: Amount of days to consider certificate as being to-be-expired. Empty wil use Cluster default.

check-maximum-elapsed-time.title: Maximum elapsed time for a site to reply (seconds)
check-maximum-elapsed-time.description: Maximum elapsed time for a site to reply to be considered good. Empty will use Cluster detault.

failure-amount.title: Amount of failures to consider URL as in bad state
failure-amount.description: Amount of failures to consider URL as in bad state, can be set to higher value for endpoints with accepted short outages. Empty will use Cluster default.

region.title: Applicable Region
region.description: Defines presence of the check in given region.

check-frontend-ip-list.title: Check Frontend IPs
check-frontend-ip-list.description: List of frontend IPs to check against. Empty will use Region default.
